#summary Configuration File documentation

= The Configuration File =
The project Configuration File controls the conversion process.
Among other things, it controls the Form that all converted forms will inherit (default: "System.Windows.Forms.Form"), the classes that handle conversion of MS Access controls to .Net controls, the "root" control that will receive converted controls in .NET, etc.

Browse the XSD file
[https://code.google.com/p/access-dotnet-forms-converter/source/browse/trunk/AccessDotNetConverter/AccessDotNetConverter/AccessToDotNetControlMap.xsd here]

A Sample file can be found 
[https://code.google.com/p/access-dotnet-forms-converter/source/browse/trunk/AccessDotNetConverter/AccessDotNetConverter/defaultProjectConfig.xml here] with instructions enbedded.
